LUXURY APARTMENT FOR SALE IN OSPEDALETTI

€ 900.000
Ref. 5665

Aleksei Azarov

Description

Luxury apartment for sale in Ospedaletti

A few steps from the sea and the center of Ospedaletti, in the elegant "Regina Margherita" condominium, a three-room apartment of approximately 127 m2 located on the ground floor is for sale.

The apartment faces south with sea view and is composed of: entrance, living room with large terrace and kitchen, two bedrooms, two bathrooms, as well as a staircase leading to the upper floor where there is a recreational area (or a third bedroom). The concierge service is active all day, the entrance to the area is equipped with an automatic gate, and the condominium is equipped with a park, swimming pool and parking spaces. The price includes a garage for one car of 20 m2 and a cellar of 8 m2.
